answers.answer: Hi,Firstly, I’ll suggest you to get his blood sugar done as we need to rule out diabetes. Kidney function tests also should be carried out to see if the kidneys are functioning normally or not. In case, both these tests are normal, then it seems like some kind of stress could precipitate the same. I sincerely hope that helps. Take care.

question: My 4 1/2 year old - completely potty trained at 3 yrs - had over the last month been urinating VERY frequently during the day - just today 5 times in 1 1/2 hours - has has suddenly been wetting the bed.  Today she had an "accident" at nap time which hasen't happened in over a year.  Her doctor said she was constipated but she has no problem w/ bowel movements.  Has at least 2 day.....  There's no sudden changes at home or anything I can think of that she would be "stressed" about.  Sould I see a specialest?
title: Sudden frequent daytime urintation and bed wetting 4 year ord
